=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/03/16
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rob Bowman', 'John Terlesky', 'Bill Roe', 'Bryan Spicer', 'Paul Holahan', 'Thomas J. Wright', 'Jeff Bleckner', 'David Barrett', 'Kate Woods', 'Larry Shaw']}
Review Text: I am literally hooked on Castle. I watch reruns all the time. It's probably not the best TV series ever made but it's highly entertaining, witty and it also has it's serious moments, when meaningful things are said. Plus it has Stana Katic, whom I think is one of the most beautiful women on TV right now.
Review Title: Hooked on Castle
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
